thread.title: Divina
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Divina

author: Divina
title: Divina
text:
Bought a pair of Specialized Grail Women's Gloves for $34.99
The experience was great. They were shipped in a quick fashion.
Just a little disappointed when they came with a big yellow Closeout Price sticker with price of $17.99 and I paid $34.99. I guess somedays you just can't win.
Well I was wrong! They made it right and without question! Will use them again! Thank you!
